publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6349 Stewart Stevenson: High Speed Rail Link—That the Parliament welcomes the work of High Speed Two, Greengauge21 and Network Rail, among others, which have developed the case for high-speed rail in the United Kingdom during the last year; notes the strong economic and environmental case for extending high-speed rail to Scotland; notes the opportunity to engage with the new Westminster administration to secure Scotland’s place in a UK high-speed rail network, and supports work to bring high-speed rail to Scotland at the earliest opportunity. Supported by: John Swinney*
